formatDescription: Q&A was a database and word processing software program for IBM PC-compatible computers published by Symantec and partners from 1985 to 1998. Due to their age, Q&A files may lack an extension.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Q&A Write Word Processor (WP)
internalSignatures.note:
BOF: TBWP or TBTX, followed by null. TB stands for TouchBase, Symantec's original internal name for the product. WP = Word Processor including header/footer. TX = Text only.
Format is described here:
https://books.google.co.uk/books?id=YfkUKcyI7KIC&pg=PT439
